languages.text: Техножрецы корабля с большой печалью взялись за операцию, умоляя машинного духа о прощении. Проведя серию направленных взрывов и продувов отсеков, они заверили, что избавились от всего содержимого полости с зеркалом. Для надежности все лакуны были залиты освященным затвердевающим составом, на месте и вокруг двое суток шли молебны. Странные происшествия прекратились. Корабль смог отправиться дальше...

traits.locale_text: Техножрецы корабля с большой печалью взялись за операцию, умоляя машинного духа о прощении. Проведя серию направленных взрывов и продувов отсеков, они заверили, что избавились от всего содержимого полости с зеркалом. Для надежности все лакуны были залиты освященным затвердевающим составом, на месте и вокруг двое суток шли молебны. Странные происшествия прекратились. Корабль смог отправиться дальше...

languages.text: The ship's Tech-Priests mournfully set to work, beseeching the machine spirit for forgiveness. After a series of targeted explosions and depressurisation procedures, they assured the Lord Captain that the mirror was gone. Just in case, all cavities were filled with blessed caulk, and binharic hymns were sung for two days and nights. There were no further incidents and the ship was able to continue on its journey...
languages.original_text: Техножрецы корабля с большой печалью взялись за операцию, умоляя машинного духа о прощении. Проведя серию направленных взрывов и продувов отсеков, они заверили, что избавились от всего содержимого полости с зеркалом. Для надежности все лакуны были залиты освященным затвердевающим составом, на месте и вокруг двое суток шли молебны. Странные происшествия прекратились. Корабль смог отправиться дальше...

traits.locale_text: The ship's Tech-Priests started the operation by begging the machine spirit for forgiveness. After a series of aimed explosions and purges they reassured the Lord Captain the mirror was gone. Just in case, all cavities were filled with a blessed caulk, and binary hymns were sung for two days. The odd incedents stopped and the crew could now continue their journey.

The ship's Tech-Priests started the operation by begging the machine spirit for forgiveness. After a series of aimed explosions and purges they reassured the Lord Captain the mirror was gone. Just in case, all cavities were filled with a blessed caulk, and binary hymns were sung for two days. The odd incedents stopped and the crew could now continue their journey.

Just in case, all cavities were filled with a blessed caulk, and binary hymns were sung for two days. The odd incidents stopped and the crew could now continue their journey.

Just in case, all cavities were filled with blessed caulk, and binharic hymns were sung for two days and nights. There were no further incidents and the ship was able to continue on its journey...

After a series of targeted explosions and depressurisation procedures, they assured the Lord Captain that the mirror was gone. Just in case, all cavities were filled with blessed caulk, and binary hymns were sung for two days and nights. There were no further incidents and the ship was able to continue on its journey...

The ship's Tech-Priests mournfully set to work, beseeching the machine spirit for forgiveness. After a series of targeted explosions and depressurisation procedures, they assured the Lord Captain that the mirror was gone. Just in case, all cavities were filled with blessed caulk, and binharic hymns were sung for two days and nights. There were no further incidents and the ship was able to continue on its journey...

languages.text: 船上的技术神甫们哀伤地开始工作，恳求着机魂的保佑。经过一系列针对性的爆炸与减压程序之后，技术神甫们向舰长大人保证，说镜子已经彻底消失。为了以防万一，船上所有的空隙都被填满了受过祝福的填缝剂，所有技术神甫整整吟唱了两天两夜二进制的赞美诗。在这之后，没有再发生过任何事故，飞船得以继续前进……
languages.original_text: The ship's Tech-Priests mournfully set to work, beseeching the machine spirit for forgiveness. After a series of targeted explosions and depressurisation procedures, they assured the Lord Captain that the mirror was gone. Just in case, all cavities were filled with blessed caulk, and binharic hymns were sung for two days and nights. There were no further incidents and the ship was able to continue on its journey...

traits.locale_text: 船上的技术祭司们哀伤地开始工作，恳求着机魂的保佑。经过一系列针对性的爆炸与减压程序之后，技术祭司们向舰长大人保证，说镜子已经彻底消失。为了以防万一，船上所有的空隙都被填满了受过祝福的填缝剂，所有技术祭司整整吟唱了两天两夜二进制的赞美诗。在这之后，没有再发生过任何事故，飞船得以继续前进……

languages.text: Los tecnosacerdotes de la nave empezaron su trabajo con tristeza, rogando el perdón del espíritu máquina. Tras una serie de explosiones localizadas y procedimientos de despresurización, aseguraron a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán que el espejo ya no estaba en la nave. Por si acaso, se llenaron todos los huecos de sellador sagrado y se cantaron himnos binarios durante dos días y dos noches. Sin más incidentes, la nave continuó su viaje...
languages.original_text: The ship's Tech-Priests mournfully set to work, beseeching the machine spirit for forgiveness. After a series of targeted explosions and depressurisation procedures, they assured the Lord Captain that the mirror was gone. Just in case, all cavities were filled with blessed caulk, and binharic hymns were sung for two days and nights. There were no further incidents and the ship was able to continue on its journey...

traits.locale_text: Los tecnosacerdotes de la nave empezaron su trabajo con tristeza, rogando el perdón del espíritu máquina. Tras una serie de explosiones localizadas y procedimientos de despresurización, aseguraron a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán que el espejo ya no estaba en la nave. Por si acaso, se llenaron todos los huecos de sellador sagrado y se cantaron himnos binarios durante dos días y dos noches. Sin más incidentes, la nave continuó su viaje...

languages.text: 船の技術司祭（テックプリースト）たちは嘆きながら作業に取りかかり、機械精霊（マシーンスピリット）に許しを請うた。標的を定めた一連の爆発と減圧処置の後、ロード・キャプテンに今度こそ鏡がなくなったと告げた。念のため、すべての穴をコーキング材で満たし、二昼夜にわたってバイナリックの賛美歌が歌われた。その後、事故はなく、船は旅を続けることができた…
languages.original_text: The ship's Tech-Priests mournfully set to work, beseeching the machine spirit for forgiveness. After a series of targeted explosions and depressurisation procedures, they assured the Lord Captain that the mirror was gone. Just in case, all cavities were filled with blessed caulk, and binharic hymns were sung for two days and nights. There were no further incidents and the ship was able to continue on its journey...

traits.locale_text: 船の技術司祭（テックプリースト）たちは嘆きながら作業に取りかかり、機械精霊（マシーンスピリット）に許しを請うた。標的を定めた一連の爆発と減圧処置の後、ロード・キャプテンに今度こそ鏡がなくなったと告げた。念のため、すべての穴をコーキング材で満たし、二昼夜にわたってバイナリックの賛美歌が歌われた。その後、事故はなく、船は旅を続けることができた…

languages.text: Die Techpriester des Schiffs machen sich mit trauriger Miene an die Arbeit, wobei sie den Maschinengeist anflehen, ihnen zu verzeihen. Nach einer Reihe von Prozeduren, um gezielt Explosionen und Druckablässe herbeizuführen, versicherten sie dem Lord Captain, dass der Spiegel fort war. Nur zur Sicherheit wurden alle Öffnungen mit gesegneter Dichtmasse verschlossen und es wurden zwei Tage und Nächte lang binhäre Hymnen gesungen. Es gab keine weiteren Zwischenfälle und das Schiff konnte seine Reise fortsetzen ...
languages.original_text: The ship's Tech-Priests mournfully set to work, beseeching the machine spirit for forgiveness. After a series of targeted explosions and depressurisation procedures, they assured the Lord Captain that the mirror was gone. Just in case, all cavities were filled with blessed caulk, and binharic hymns were sung for two days and nights. There were no further incidents and the ship was able to continue on its journey...

traits.locale_text: Die Techpriester des Schiffs machen sich mit trauriger Miene an die Arbeit, wobei sie den Maschinengeist anflehen, ihnen zu verzeihen. Nach einer Reihe von Prozeduren, um gezielt Explosionen und Druckablässe herbeizuführen, versicherten sie dem Lord Captain, dass der Spiegel fort war. Nur zur Sicherheit wurden alle Öffnungen mit gesegneter Dichtmasse verschlossen und es wurden zwei Tage und Nächte lang binhäre Hymnen gesungen. Es gab keine weiteren Zwischenfälle und das Schiff konnte seine Reise fortsetzen ...

languages.text: Les technoprêtres du vaisseau se mettent au travail avec tristesse, implorant la pitié de l'esprit de la machine. Après une série d'explosions ciblées et de procédures de dépressurisation, ils assurent {mf|au|à la} seigneur-capitaine que le miroir n'est plus. Juste au cas où, toutes les cavités ont été remplies de mastic béni, et des hymnes binhaires ont été chantées pendant deux jours et deux nuits. Les incidents ont alors cessé et le vaisseau a pu poursuivre son voyage...
languages.original_text: The ship's Tech-Priests mournfully set to work, beseeching the machine spirit for forgiveness. After a series of targeted explosions and depressurisation procedures, they assured the Lord Captain that the mirror was gone. Just in case, all cavities were filled with blessed caulk, and binharic hymns were sung for two days and nights. There were no further incidents and the ship was able to continue on its journey...

languages.text: Geminin Tekno Rahipleri, keder içinde işe koyulup makine ruhundan af diliyor. Bir dizi hedefli patlama ve basınç düşürme işleminin ardından Lord Kaptan'a aynanın yok olduğuna dair güvence veriyorlar. Her ihtimale karşı tüm çukurlar kutsanmış kalafatla dolduruluyor ve iki gün iki gece boyunca ikilidil ilahiler söyleniyor. Gemide başka bir hadise yaşanmadan yolculuğa devam ediliyor...
languages.original_text: The ship's Tech-Priests mournfully set to work, beseeching the machine spirit for forgiveness. After a series of targeted explosions and depressurisation procedures, they assured the Lord Captain that the mirror was gone. Just in case, all cavities were filled with blessed caulk, and binharic hymns were sung for two days and nights. There were no further incidents and the ship was able to continue on its journey...
